price: 30. Maxay qoomamo u ahaatay addoomaha! Ma jiro Rasuul u yimaada aanay ku jeesjeesin.
arabic: يَٰحَسۡرَةً عَلَى ٱلۡعِبَادِۚ مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāḥasratan ʿalā al-ʿibādi mā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
